channel.title: John Harnois on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in John Harnois on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: a2b3 lunch non-summary for 4th Thursday of April at Argus Farm Stop
item.description: A nice lunch at Argus Farm Stop. I bought bread for the table, John Harnois supplied hard-boiled duck eggs from Harnois Farm, and we had 9 at the table.
